product_name: Pro-Tec Athletics Y Massage Roller - 15.5 in.
long_description: Use the Pro-Tec Athletics Y Massage roller to stretch sore muscles and perform myofascial release techniques to improve flexibility. Y-shape ridges help you target deep-tissue massage. High-density foam stands up to regular use. Pro-Tec Athletics Y Massage roller measures 6 x 15.5 in. (dia. x length).
short_description: Use the Pro-Tec Athletics Y Massage roller to stretch sore muscles and perform myofascial release techniques to improve flexibility.
